page.title: 18Education in Dorridge
page.content: There are three{schools}in the village -Dorridge Junior,Dorridge Infant and our own school St.George & St.Teresa R.C.Junior and Infant.In an area where educational expectations are high all have an excellent reputation. All are sited on one campus and the total population is about 900 {children. Three further Primary schools are in neighbouring areas and the whole is served by one comprehensive school in the village of Knowle. From the comprehensive school the vast majority of{pupils}from this area proceed to the Sixth Form College in Solihull and usually on to some form of higher education.
